mapper.sql: ID, MERCHANT_CODE, USER_ID, COUPON_TYPE, AMOUNT, STATUS, to_char(b.START_DATE,'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') START_DATE , to_char(b.END_DATE,'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') END_DATE, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, MEMBER_CARD, MOBILE, MERCHANT_NAME

select A.*,ROWNUM RN from ( select b.ID, b.MERCHANT_CODE, b.USER_ID, b.COUPON_TYPE, b.AMOUNT, b.STATUS, to_char(b.START_DATE,'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') START_DATE , to_char(b.END_DATE,'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') END_DATE, b.CREATE_TIME, to_char(b.UPDATE_TIME,'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') UPDATE_TIME, u.MEMBER_CARD, u.MOBILE, u.MERCHANT_NAME from wx_users u ,wx_coupon b

ID, MERCHANT_CODE, USER_ID, TRAN_AMT, BUSINESS_TYPE, ORDER_AMT, POUNDAGE, BUSINESS_SOURCE, SERIAL, BUSINESS_RESULT, POS_SN, INTEGRAL, SOURCE_SERIAL, STATUS, CARD_NUMBER, BANK_NAME, SERVICE_SCORE, ENVIRONMENT_SCORE, PRICE_SCORE, BUSINESS_TIME, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, MEMBER_CARD, MERCHANT_NAME,YHJE,MOBILE,PAY_TYPE,SIGN_IMAGE

select A.*,ROWNUM RN from ( select * from ( select b.ID, b.MERCHANT_CODE, b.USER_ID, b.TRAN_AMT, b.BUSINESS_TYPE,b.COUPON_AMT as YHJE, b.ORDER_AMT, b.POUNDAGE, b.BUSINESS_SOURCE, b.SERIAL, b.BUSINESS_RESULT, b.POS_SN, b.INTEGRAL, b.SOURCE_SERIAL, b.STATUS, b.CARD_NUMBER, b.BANK_NAME, b.SERVICE_SCORE, b.ENVIRONMENT_SCORE, b.PRICE_SCORE,to_char(b.BUSINESS_TIME,'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') BUSINESS_TIME, b.CREATE_TIME, b.UPDATE_TIME, b.PAY_TYPE,b.MERCHANT_NAME,b.SIGN_IMAGE from wx_users_bussiness b
ID, MERCHANT_CODE, TRAN_AMT, BUSINESS_TYPE, ORDER_AMT, POUNDAGE, SERIAL, BUSINESS_RESULT, STATUS, BUSINESS_TIME, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, MERCHANT_NAME , SOURCE_SERIAL,CHN_ORDER_NO

select A.*,ROWNUM RN from ( select ID, MERCHANT_CODE, TRAN_AMT, BUSINESS_TYPE, ORDER_AMT, POUNDAGE, SERIAL, BUSINESS_RESULT, STATUS, to_char(BUSINESS_TIME,'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') BUSINESS_TIME, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, MERCHANT_NAME ,SOURCE_SERIAL,CHN_ORDER_NO from wx_shop_bussiness
mapper.select:
select count(*) from wx_users_bussiness b where b.business_source='02' and b.PAY_TYPE='01'
and b.MEMBER_CARD like '%${member_card}%'
and b.MERCHANT_NAME like '%${merchant_name}%'
and b.BUSINESS_RESULT = #{business_result}
and b.SERIAL like '%${serial}%'
and b.ORDER_AMT = #{order_amt}
and b.BUSINESS_TIME between to_date('${strDate}','yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') and to_date('${endDate}','yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')

select count(*) from wx_users_bussiness b where b.business_source='00'
and b.MEMBER_CARD like '%${member_card}%'
and b.MERCHANT_NAME like '%${merchant_name}%'
and b.BUSINESS_RESULT = #{business_result}
and b.SERIAL like '%${serial}%'
and b.ID like '%${id}%'
and b.BUSINESS_TYPE = #{business_type}
and b.BUSINESS_TIME between to_date('${strDate}','yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') and to_date('${endDate}','yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')

select count(*) from wx_users_bussiness b where b.business_source='01'
and b.MEMBER_CARD like '%${member_card}%'
and b.MERCHANT_NAME like '%${merchant_name}%'
and b.BUSINESS_RESULT = #{business_result}
and b.SERIAL like '%${serial}%'
and b.SOURCE_SERIAL like '%${source_serial}%'
and b.ID like '%${id}%'
and b.BUSINESS_TIME between to_date('${strDate}','yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') and to_date('${endDate}','yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')

select count(*) from wx_users_bussiness b where b.PAY_TYPE='01'
and b.MEMBER_CARD like '%${member_card}%'
and b.MERCHANT_NAME like '%${merchant_name}%'
and b.BUSINESS_RESULT = #{business_result}
and b.SERIAL like '%${serial}%'
and b.BUSINESS_SOURCE = #{business_source}
and b.BUSINESS_TIME between to_date('${strDate}','yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') and to_date('${endDate}','yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
